QuestData.Title: Weed Whacker
QuestData.Description: <Kilag barely has time to acknowledge you between rifle shots, but his eye does linger a moment on your Goblin All-In-1-der Belt appreciatively.>$B$BNow is the time for creative solutions. Pull something out of that belt and get to work!$B$B<Thinking about the situation for a moment, an idea comes to your mind and it's just crazy enough to work!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Weed Whacker within your Goblin All-In-1der Belt to mow down 100 of the plants within the Vicious Vale.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are still too many for us to get through.$B$BHave faith in yourself, $n. Let your true warrior heart shine through.
QuestData.RewardText: I saw it with my own eyes, and still I do not believe it!$B$BYou have our thanks and the debt of our lives, little goblin. I hope that soon we can repay you the honor.$B$BMay I ask a small favor of you while my scouts and I move on?
